title: How much is $15 worth of RP?
body: Im getting a $15 Burger king gift card in the next week or so, and my question is how much RP can i trade it for? also, since there is no $15 RP trade in button on the 'purchase RP' page, how will i redeem it? my guess is that i will use $10 to buy 1380 RP, then use the remaining $5 to buy 650 (so ill basically treat it like a visa card), but does anyone know for sure?

replies.body: This may be the case!  Since there is no $15, you'd have to do two separate transactions.  Keep in mind that depending on where you are, you could see external fees like taxes per the [Openbucks ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753254-Cash-and-Gift-Cards-Openbucks-)guide.  I hope that helps!
